Information Usage

When you use the Spirit of Satoshi GPT, we may collect and process the text
inputs and queries you provide.

Data Storage

We want to emphasize that we do not record or store any of the information or
queries you submit to the Spirit of Satoshi GPT on our servers.

Cookies and Similar Technologies

We do not use cookies or similar tracking technologies to collect information
about your browsing activity when you use the Spirit of Satoshi GPT.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
